revision.text: ==Galician== ===Etymology=== Cognate with {{cog|es|jota}}, from {{der|gl|mxi|sc=Latn|*šáwta||jump}}, from {{der|gl|la|saltō||I dance}}. ===Noun=== {{gl-noun|f}} # A popular [[dance]] with a [[lively]] rhythm, common in [[Aragon]], [[Navarre]], and [[Valencia]]. # [[Barb]], the backwards point of the [[fishhook]]. [[Category:gl:Dance]] ---- ==Portuguese== ===Pronunciation=== {{pt-IPA|xóta}} * {{hyph|pt|xo|ta}} ===Noun=== {{pt-noun|f}} # {{lb|pt|Brazil|slang}} female genitals; [[vagina]] #: {{syn|pt|Thesaurus:vagina#Portuguese}} # {{lb|pt|Portugal|slang}} [[penis]]
